data.body:
Objective: Expose controls/status for auto-verification and enforce non-editable verification-transition beads.

Notes: After Wave 1 contracts exist, settings and status UI tasks can proceed in parallel with server/API lock enforcement.

Assigned tasks:
- Add auto-verification settings toggle with info icon
- Add verification-agent selector in settings
- Render transition:verification status treatment
- Disable editing interactions during verification
- Enforce edit lock on server/API
